job_tasks.phrase: The team aims to help PostNL make great strides in data science and generative AI.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates understanding the business goal of leveraging data science and generative AI to improve the company's standing.

job_tasks.phrase: PostNL aims to be the favorite logistics company.
job_tasks.justification: This clearly states the overarching business objective that the team's data science and AI efforts are intended to support.

job_tasks.phrase: Lead the ideation, design, and deployment of innovative solutions in data science and generative AI;
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to the process of conceptualizing, creating, and implementing AI models and solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop creative and forward-thinking functionalities for Data Science platforms;
job_tasks.justification: This implies the development and implementation of AI/ML related functionalities, which fall under modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: Optimize code efficiency and investigate novel, high-speed solutions;
job_tasks.justification: While also relating to software development, optimizing solutions in data science contexts often involves model performance tuning.

job_tasks.phrase: Drive innovation in data science technologies, fostering a culture of continuous improvement;
job_tasks.justification: This points to the advancement and exploration of data science and AI technologies, which includes modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: As a senior software engineer, you will be working in the Data Science Innovation department.
job_tasks.justification: Identifies the role as a software engineer and the department focus.

job_tasks.phrase: You will take the lead in developing innovative solutions, collaborating with experts, and advancing technology in this domain.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the lead role in developing and advancing technological solutions, which is a core software development responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: Explore new AWS services and optimize product performance through experimentation and testing;
job_tasks.justification: This involves working with cloud services and performance optimization, typical of software development for applications.

job_tasks.phrase: Provide expertise in building and maintaining a code library, emphasizing best practices and innovation;
job_tasks.justification: This describes the software engineering practice of managing and improving code repositories.

job_tasks.phrase: Automate security checks and build robust CI/CD pipelines, championing efficiency and reliability;
job_tasks.justification: These are core software development and operations tasks related to building and deploying software.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate on the development of AWS SDK solutions, pushing the boundaries of what is possible.
job_tasks.justification: This specifically calls out developing solutions using software development kits for cloud services.

job_tasks.phrase: Automate security checks and build robust CI/CD pipelines, championing efficiency and reliability;
job_tasks.justification: Building CI/CD pipelines is a key component of MLOps and operations engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Optimize code efficiency and investigate novel, high-speed solutions;
job_tasks.justification: While also modeling, optimization and high-speed solutions can relate to operational efficiency and performance tuning in production.

classification.rationale: The role emphasizes developing innovative solutions in data science and generative AI, including leading ideation and design. It also involves building and deploying these solutions, a core aspect of the GenAI Engineer profile focused on productionizing AI applications.
